high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers

Class ExceptionCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers.ExceptionCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompiler

    public final class ExceptionCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICompiler
    An instance of this class controls the compilation of an exception-definition.
